TITLE: SkinX
DESC_APPLY:
Apply the selected icon pack
to the system.
Requires root privileges.
DESC_SELECT:
Choose from available versions
by downloading them directly
from the GitHub repository.
DESC_PREF:
Configure app settings,
manage download cache
and system backups.
DESC_SUPPORT:
View documentation,
report a bug or find out how
to contribute to the project.
MSG_RESTORE_CONFIRM: Do you want to remove all custom icons?
LAUNCHPAD_CONFIRM: Do you want to reset the Launchpad layout?
MSG_FILEICON_MISSING:
The 'fileicon' utility is required but not installed.

Would you like SkinX to try and install it automatically?
MSG_RESTART_APPS: Icons injected. Remember to close and reopen apps if they are currently running.
MSG_CONFIRM_CLEAR: Do you want to delete all downloaded icon packs?
MSG_RESTART_APP: Please restart the application to apply the new language.
DISCLAIMER: Icons are property of Apple Inc. Use at your own risk. The author is not responsible for any damage.
MSG_UPDATE_PROMPT: Would you like to visit the download page?
MSG_CONFIRM_REVERT_ALL: Do you want to revert all settings to default values?
DESC_RESTORE:
Restore original system
icons by removing all
customizations applied.
MSG_LP_LAYOUT_WARNING:
ATTENTION: A method to preserve the Launchpad layout has not been implemented yet.

Applying icons will REARRANGE and REORGANIZE all your Launchpad folders and icons to the default position.

If you want to avoid losing your current layout, you MUST press CANCEL now.

Press OK only if you agree to have your Launchpad layout reset.
MSG_UPDATE_ICON_AVAILABLE:
A new version of the icon pack '{branch}' is available on GitHub.

Would you like to open the Version Selector to download it?
MSG_CONFIRM_CLEAR_CACHE: Do you want to clear all downloaded packs?
MSG_NO_BRANCHES_DOWNLOADED: No icon packs found. You need to download a version before applying any changes.
